org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator

Class ForwardReverseOptimizationOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator.OptimizationOutput
      • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator.ForwardReverseOptimizationOutput

  • public class ForwardReverseOptimizationOutput
extends OptimizationOutput
    ForwardReverseOptimizationOutput holds the Metrics that result from a Forward/Reverse Optimization Run.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
